title: Was The Hype Worth It? Cooler Master SK650 & SK630 Low Profile Keyboards
description: The Cooler Master SK650 and SK630 aren't the cheapest low profile mechanical gaming keyboards on the market but they are supposed to be some of the best. Does their performance and portable aspects live up to the hype?    *Stay tuned for Cooler Master SK650 and SK630 Amazon links!*  Check out these other Low Profile Keyboard options on Amazon:    Corsair K70 LP Rapid Gaming Keyboard:  Tesoro Gram Low Profile Gaming Keyboard:   Buy From Amazon:    Thermaltake Riing Trio:   HyperX Alloy Elite:   Logitech G Pro:    Subscribe    Review unit provided free of charge by Cooler Master. This video is sponsored by Thermaltake. As per Hardware Canucks guidelines, no review direction was received from manufacturer.   As an Amazon Associate we earn from qualifying purchases.  Gear list (Available on Amazon):  Main Camera -  Main Lens -  Main Camera Mic -  Second Camera -  $700 Camera (Panasonic G7) -  Sigma 18-35mm F1.8 -  Cinevate DUZI Slider -  AKG C314 -  AKG C 568 B -  Zoom H5 -  ------------------------------------------------------------ Our full site:  Join Our Forums:   Follow us for more updates! Twitter  FaceBook  Instagram  -------------------------------------------------------  #sk650 #sk630 #hardwarecanucks #coolermaster #tenkeyless #gamingkeyboard
